Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , the bridged dithiophene has attracted considerable attention as a donor unit because of its ability to fix the dithiophene system into a planar structure , which is much more efficient than the dithiophene in constructing highly - conjugated copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bridged dithiophene |
| dithiophene |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "bridged dithiophene" and "dithiophene". These entities are mentioned as materials or components in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bridged dithiophene |

The only clear "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "bridged dithiophene". The other mention of "dithiophene" is not a clear material name in this context, as it is used in comparison to the bridged dithiophene.

Paragraph: Recently , the bridged dithiophene has attracted considerable attention as a donor unit because of its ability to fix the dithiophene system into a planar structure , which is much more efficient than the dithiophene in constructing highly - conjugated copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| the bridged dithiophene |
| a planar structure |
| highly-conjugated copolymers |

Explanation:

1. "the bridged dithiophene" is identified as a Property Name because it is referred to as an entity that has been attracting considerable attention due to its unique property of fixing the dithiophene system into a planar structure.
2. "a planar structure" is identified as a Property Name because it is referred to as a property of the bridged dithiophene that makes it more efficient than the dithiophene in constructing highly-conjugated copolymers.
3. "highly-conjugated copolymers" is identified as a Property Name because it is referred to as a property of the bridged dithiophene that makes it more efficient than the dithiophene.

Explanation:

1. "the bridged dithiophene" is not included as a Property Name because it is not a material property, but rather a material or a compound.
2. "a planar structure" is identified as a Property Name because it is a property of a material that can affect its behavior or performance.
3. "highly-conjugated copolymers" is not included as a Property Name because it is not a material property, but rather a type of material or compound.
